Smithsonian Miscellaneous Collections 

PART OF VOLUME XLIX 

Report on the Crustacea (Brachyura and 

Anomura) Collected by the North 

Pacific Exploring Expedition, 

1853-1856 

BY 

WILLIAM STIMPSON 

Xu. 17i; 

CITY OF WASHINGTON 

PUBLISHED BY THE SMITHSONIAN INSTITUTION 

1907
